name: token-transformer
description: A utility that transforms tokens from Figma Tokens to a format that is readable by Style Dictionary.

scripts.build-typography-test: node index.js tokens.json temp/typography.json base/options,base/sizing,core/typography base/options,base/sizing
scripts.build-composition-test: node index.js tokens.json temp/composition.json base/options,base/sizing,core/composition base/options,base/sizing --expandComposition=true
scripts.test: npm run build-typography-test && npm run build-light-test && npm run build-dark-test && npm run build-single-file-test-theme-config && npm run build-folder-test && npm run build-folder-test-theme-config && npm run build-resolve-false-test && npm run build-composition-test && jest
